Products.Title: Blazor Data Grid
Products.Description: A fast and responsive grid component with unlimited master-detail levels and unmatched data shaping capabilities.

Products.Title: Blazor Pivot Grid
Products.Description: An Excel-inspired pivot table control engineered for multi-dimensional data analysis and cross-tab reporting.

Products.Title: Blazor Charts
Products.Description: Fast and lightweight chart component with 20+ data presentation types.

Products.Title: Blazor Scheduler
Products.Description: A fully-featured scheduling solution that easily displays a detailed snapshot of events/appointments in your web application across a single day or a week.

Products.Title: Blazor Data Editors
Products.Description: An extensive suite of data editors to be used standalone or within container components.

Products.Title: Blazor Navigation and Layout
Products.Description: A suite of navigation components including TreeView and Pager, in conjunction with layout components that are designed to make your UI adaptive.

RootDemoPages.Title: Blazor UI Components
RootDemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, overview, getting started, devexpress, demo
RootDemoPages.Description: DevExpress UI for Blazor ships with native user interface components (including a Data Grid, Pivot Grid, Charts and Scheduler) so you can design rich user experiences with both Blazor.
RootDemoPages.OG_Title: Native Blazor Components powered by DevExpress
RootDemoPages.OG_Description: DevExpress UI for Blazor ships with native user interface components (including a Data Grid, Pivot Grid, Charts and Scheduler) so you can design rich user experiences with both Blazor.

DemoPages.Title: Column Types
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, column type, columns, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid provides you with column objects to display and edit different data types: text, numbers, dates, and Boolean values.

DemoPages.Title: Sort Data
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, grid sort, grid sorting, datagrid sort, datagrid sorting, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid supports sorting data against multiple columns. A column's current sort order is indicated by a sort glyph displayed in the column header.

DemoPages.Title: Data Filter Row
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, grid filter, grid filtering, datagrid filter, datagrid filtering, data filter, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid supports the Filter Row that allows users to filter data.

DemoPages.Title: Templates
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, template, cell template, cell editor template, row preview template, preview sections, custom row appearance, custom cell appearance, custom content in rows, custom content in cells, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid supports templates that allow you to customize cell appearance, the edit formâ€™s layout, and row preview sections.

DemoPages.Title: Cascading Editors
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, cascade editors, cascading combobox, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid allows you to implement cascade logic within grid's edit form using DevExpress ComboBox for Blazor components.

DemoPages.Title: Edit Form Validation
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, template, form validation, form template, form template validation, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid allows you to implement a custom edit form with built-in data validation.

DemoPages.Title: Large Data Source
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, data bind, data binding, entity framework bind, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid delivers high performance when the component is bound to a large data source.

DemoPages.Title: Paging and Scrolling
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, scrolling, vertical scrolling, horizontal scrolling, virtual scrolling, load records on demand, paging, pager, pages, go to page, page size selection, custom page size, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid supports horizontal scrolling, vertical scrolling, and virtual scrolling (loading data on demand). The Data Grid displays a pager that enables data navigation.

DemoPages.Title: Master-Detail View
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, master grid, detail grid, master-detail relationship, master-detail view, detail row, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: The DevExpress Data Grid for Blazor component allows you to build master-detail layouts and relationships of any complexity and depth with a detail row template.

DemoPages.Title: Group Data
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, grouping, groups, drag-and-drop, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: The DevExpress Data Grid for Blazor component enables you to drag-and-drop grid headers or use grouping API to group data against multiple data columns.

DemoPages.Title: Selection
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, selection, multi-selection, multiple-selection, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: The DevExpress Data Grid for Blazor component supports Single Row, Multiple Rows, and Multiple Rows with Optimized Performance selection modes.

DemoPages.Title: HTML Decoration
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, conditional formating, conditional data highlighting, alternative row, row style, row color, column style, cell style, custom style, html decoration, html row decoration, html cell decoration, html attributes, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: HTML decoration in DevExpress Data Grid for Blazor allows you to color data grid cells, rows and columns according to their values.

DemoPages.Title: Remote Data Source
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, web api support, bind to web api, combobox lookup column web api support, custom data binding, custom data source, remote data source, asynchronous data-aware operations, async support, bind to json data, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Data Grid for Blazor supports custom data sources (including large data sources) and asynchronous data-aware operations.

DemoPages.Title: Toolbar
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, toolbar, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor  Data Grid can display a toolbar that aggregates buttons and commands related to the Data Grid and its data.

DemoPages.Title: Column Chooser
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, column chooser, columnchooser, columns, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid can display a Column Chooser in a toolbar. The Column Chooser is a separate window that allows users to show, hide, and reorder Data Grid columns at runtime.

DemoPages.Title: Edit Data
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, data grid, datagrid, grid, data editing, edit data, edit form, popup edit form, add rows, add new row, insert row, remove rows, delete rows, edit row values, edit modes, edit options, command column, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Data Grid allows users to edit data in the edit form or in the popup edit form.

DemoPages.Title: Overview
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, pivot grid, pivot table, sorting, grouping, sub-totals, grand-totals, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Pivot Grid summarizes data from the underlying data source and presents the results in cross-tabulated format.

DemoPages.Title: Templates
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, pivot grid, pivot table, customization, cell templates, formatting, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Pivot Grid allows you to use native Razor markup to define custom templates for grid fields.

DemoPages.Title: Large Data Source
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, pivot grid, pivot table, data binding, entity framework bind, paging, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Pivot Grid delivers high performance when the component is bound to a large data source.

DemoPages.Title: Chart Integration
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, pivot grid, pivot table, charts, pivot grid and chart integration, data visualization, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: The DevExpress Pivot Grid for Blazor can be easily integrated with DevExpress Charts for Blazor. This allows you to visualize grid's data on a chart.

DemoPages.Title: Series Types
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, charts, bar, line, area, bubble, series, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Charts supports the following series types: Line, Area, Bar, and Bubble series.

DemoPages.Title: Dynamic Series
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, charts, dynamic series, series template, aggregation, grouping, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Charts allows you to dynamically select data that matches the specified criterion from a data source and display chart series based on this data.

DemoPages.Title: Axes
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, charts, chart, customization, axes, multiple axes, chart rotation, rotating charts, swap axes, horizontal bars, continuous axis, discrete axis, logarithmic axis, axis types, argument types, value types, string values, date-time values, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Charts allow users to display multiple axes, swap axes (rotate the chart), and choose axis types

DemoPages.Title: Customization
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, charts, customization, tooltips, legend, toggle series, multiple axes, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Charts allows users to customize tooltips and legend items. Additionally, the component supports displaying charts with multiple axes that help to combine several charts.

DemoPages.Title: Range Series
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, charts, range series, range area, range bar, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Charts supports Range Bar and Range Area series that display value ranges corresponding to argument values.

DemoPages.Title: Financial Series
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, charts, candlestick, stock, financial, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Charts supports Candlestick and Stock series that display how financial indicators change in time.

DemoPages.Title: Pie Series
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, charts, pie, donut, doughnut, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Charts supports Pie and Donut series that allow you to compare the percentage values of different point arguments and illustrate these values as pie slices.

DemoPages.Title: Series Customization
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, chart, series, label, point, customization, appearance, point color, custom text, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Charts allow users to customize series points and their labels' appearance and provide custom images for points.

DemoPages.Title: View Types
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, scheduler, day view, work week view, week view, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: The Scheduler UI for Blazor can display regular and recurrent appointments in a Day, Work Week or Week View. The Scheduler also allows users to create, remove, and manage appointments.

DemoPages.Title: Recurring Appointments
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, scheduler, recurring appointments, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: The Scheduler UI for Blazor can display regular and recurrent appointments in a Day, Work Week or Week View. The Scheduler also allows users to create, remove, and manage appointments.

DemoPages.Title: Templates
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, scheduler, appointments, template, appointment template, customization, custom appointment appearance, appointment style, custom appointment UI, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: The DevExpress Scheduler allows you to use templates to customize appointment appearance.

DemoPages.Title: ComboBox
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, combo box, combobox, data binding, databinding, data source, virtual scrolling, scrolling, custom input, filtering, data filtering, incremental filtering, null text, nulltext, cascading lists,  devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor ComboBox is a drop-down list editor that supports virtual scrolling, incremental filtering, and cascade logic.

DemoPages.Title: Spin Edit
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, spinedit, spin edit, number editor, null text, prompt text, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Spin Edit allows the user to modify numeric data by typing a new value into the text box or by using the up/down spin buttons to increment/decrement the value.

DemoPages.Title: CheckBox
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, checkbox, check box, indeterminate checkbox, image in checkbox, switch, toggle, custom text, customization, label, data binding, databinding, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor CheckBox is a check editor that allows users to select yes/no or true/false. The component supports the indeterminate state, binding to custom data types, and the Switch mode.

DemoPages.Title: Date Edit
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, date edit, dateedit, date, calendar, null text, prompt text, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Date Edit is a date editor with a drop-down calendar or an adaptive scroll picker. The component allows you to enter a date into the text box or pick one from the drop-down window.

DemoPages.Title: Text Box
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, text box, textbox, memo, null text, prompt text, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Text Box is a single-line editor that enables a user to enter and edit text. The component also supports binding to a data source and password mode.

DemoPages.Title: Calendar
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, calendar, date, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Calendar allows users to select dates and navigate through months and years. The component supports multiple date selection and cell customization.

DemoPages.Title: List Box
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, list box, listbox, list editor, readonly list, read-only list, data binding, databinding, data source, virtual scrolling, scrolling, select, select multiple, select option checkbox, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor List Box allows users to select items from a list of predefined strings. The component supports multiple item selection, virtual scrolling and read-only mode.

DemoPages.Title: TagBox
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, tag box, tagbox, tags, custom tags, data binding, databinding, data source, virtual scrolling, scrolling, filtering, incremental filtering, starts with filtering, contains filtering, null text, nulltext, templates, validation, read-only tagbox, multiple tag selection, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor TagBox allows users to select multiple tags from a drop-down list or type custom tags. TagBox supports incremental filtering, virtual scrolling, validation, and templates.

DemoPages.Title: Memo
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, memo, text area, multi-line text box, text in multiple lines, text in multiple rows, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Memo is a multi-line text area that allows users to type and edit text in multiple rows.

DemoPages.Title: Button
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, button, buttons, action, button styles, button with icon, button with image, Blazor button for bootstrap, submit button, button click, template, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Button provides various render styles and can display icons. Button supports the disable state, form submission, templates, and HTML attributes.

DemoPages.Title: Context Menu
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, menu, context menu, contextmenu, popup menu,  devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Context Menu allows you to add a context menu to your Blazor application. You can populate the Context Menu items manually or bound the component to a hierarchical data structure.

DemoPages.Title: Form Layout
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, form, form editor, form layout, formlayout, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Form Layout allows you to construct responsive and automatically-aligned edit forms. Form Layout can group items, display UI elements in tabs. You can also bind the component to a data source.

DemoPages.Title: TreeView
DemoPages.Keywords: Blazor, components, treeview, tree view, tree component, navigation, tree navigation, selection, node selection, hierarchical data binding, hierarchical databinding, binding to hierarchical data, hierarchical data source, hierarchy, nodes, display master-detail data, display master-detail object, display master-detail objects, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor TreeView displays hierarchical data structures within a tree-like UI. The component supports data binding and master-detail relationships.

DemoPages.Title: Tabs
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, tab, tabs, tabcontrol, tab control, pagecontrol, page control, page component, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Tabs allows you to implement tabbed layout and control an active tab from code. You can also use this component to emulate a Page control in your Blazor application.

DemoPages.Title: Pager
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, pager, pages, pager component, pages component, go to page, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Pager enables data navigation and helps visualize a current position within a bound data source. The component allows you to set up the total number of pages and the number of visible page numbers.

DemoPages.Title: Popup
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, popup, window, dialog, popup dialog, popup window, modal popup, modal dialog, modal window, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Popup is a pop-up window that overlays the current view. The component consists of a customizable header, pop-up body, and footer.

DemoPages.Title: Toolbar
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, toolbar, toolbar component, button, adaptivity, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Toolbar allows you to implement an adaptive button-based interface in your web application. The component supports drop-down, checked, and radio buttons and allows you to define item templates.

DemoPages.Title: Upload
DemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, upload, upload control, file upload, file upload control, upload files, blazor upload, chunk upload, large files upload, large files, delayed upload, delay file upload, multi-file selection, drag and drop, external drop zone, validation, limit uploaded file size, validate uploaded file extension, devexpress, demo, sample, example
DemoPages.Description: DevExpress Blazor Upload allows users to upload files to the server. It supports drag and drop, chunk upload for large files, multi-file selection, and validation.

RootDemoPages.Title: Form Validation
RootDemoPages.Keywords: blazor, components, form, form validation, data validation, devexpress, demo, sample, example
RootDemoPages.Description: The DevExpress UI components for Blazor support the built-in form validation. You can validate DevExpress Blazor data editors, Form Layout, or  your custom edit form.
